IPipeTail Class Reference

Provides a very basic (empty) interface for the last object in the processing pipeline. More...

Detailed Description

Provides a very basic (empty) interface for the last object in the processing pipeline.

Use this interface as follows when you intend the class you are building to be the last object in a pipeline configuration (a pipe tail, or a pipe segment with no output):

		class MyPipeTail : public PipeLineProcessing::IPipeTail

You could accomplish the same thing by making MyPipeTail inherit from IPipeSegmentBase, PipeSegmentBaseAdapter, or even PipeSegment<AnyIPipeSegmentBaseType>, however this interface is provided for the expressed purpose of making it semantically clear what the programmer intends. Please use it appropriately.

Version:
0.1
